Class HibernateConfigurationDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kaaproject.kaa.server.common.dao.impl.sql.HibernateAbstractDao<Configuration>
      • org.kaaproject.kaa.server.common.dao.impl.sql.HibernateConfigurationDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationDao<Configuration>, Dao<Configuration,String>, SqlDao<Configuration>

    @Repository
public class HibernateConfigurationDao
extends HibernateAbstractDao<Configuration>
implements ConfigurationDao<Configuration>
